product_name: Topeak RX TrunkBag EX Rack Trunk
long_description: The compact Topeak RX TrunkBag EX is sized and organized to meet your road-riding needs. TrunkBag EX attaches to your bike via a Topeak RX QuickTrack(TM) rear rack system, sold separately. Molded construction is stiff, water repellent and aerodynamic. Compact design features 1 main top and 2 side compartments; multiple compartments help keep gear organized. Includes an adjustable bungee cord on top and rear light webbing clip in back. Reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. Includes shoulder strap for carrying the bag when you're off the bike.
short_description: The compact Topeak RX TrunkBag EX is sized and organized to meet your road-riding needs.
